definition: not astigmatic, a person whose body is marked by religious stigmata, such as marks resembling the wounds of the crucified Christ
details:
adjective
- not astigmatic
= synonyms: anastigmatic
- pertaining to a lens or lens system free of astigmatism (able to form point images)
= synonyms: anastigmatic
- pertaining to or resembling or having stigmata
noun
- a person whose body is marked by religious stigmata, such as marks resembling the wounds of the crucified Christ
= example: a person whose body is marked by religious stigmata, such as marks resembling the wounds of the crucified Christ
= synonyms: stigmatist
